might be - VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation NV6 [Vanta/Vanta LT]  (rev 15)
Let's try the newer drivers first: sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx
After the installation of the driver you need to enable it.
for Edgy: sudo nvidia-xconfig, for Dapper and older: sudo nvidia-glx-config enable
After that, you need to restart the PC; an nvidia-screen will welcome you before GDM starts. That means it was successful.
